scripts.deploy: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist`:gh-pages --force || git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.predeploy: git branch gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit && npm run build && git add dist -f && git commit -m 'Deployment commit'
scripts.postdeploy: git checkout main && git branch -D gh-pages
